FILE_LINES_T* bubble_sort ( FILE_LINES_T *  flines,
ALGORITHM_STAT_T *  stat 
)

Sort the FILE_LINES_T using the bubble sort algorithm.

Parameters:
flinesFILE_LINES_T with the lines to sort
statALGORITHM_STAT_T with the structure to store the statistical data of the sort operation
Returns:
FILE_LINES_T with the sorted lines
See also:
http://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bubble_sort#C_2

char **  aux,
int  size,
ALGORITHM_STAT_T *  stat 
)

Auxiliary function with the merge sort algorithm.

Parameters:
**flines_srcwith the lines to sort
**auxwith with the lines clone to use as auxiliary object
sizeinteger with the number of lines to process
statALGORITHM_STAT_T with the structure to store the statistical data of the sort operation
See also:
http://www.codecodex.com/wiki/Merge_sort#C

int q_sort_aux ( const void *  a,
const void *  b 
)

Auxiliary function for q_sort algorithm.

Parameters:
astring to be compared with the next parameter
bstring to be compared with the previous parameter
Returns:
integer 0 if the strings are equal, 1 or -1 otherwise
